name: Clash of Moningus
description:
Clash of Moningus is a tower defense game, where you will use strategy to overcome different obstacles and finally neutralize the threat of invading moningus. 

You start with three primary units, and as you progress you will unlock new ones.

Each zone has five levels, and each zone is influenced by a specific season, granting buffs and debuffs on enemies and allied units.

Will you be able to repel the threat of the Moningus?
